headline: Mo Brooks Scores Fundraiser with Trump as Primary Opponent Fumbles Mar-a-Lago Meeting
author: John Binder
sentences: President Trump has endorsed Mo Brooks, Donald Trump Jr. endorsed Mo just last week, and the day Katie met with President Trump he agreed to do a major fundraiser for Congressman Brooks at Mar-a-Lago,? the Brooks campaign told Breitbart News.

Alabama Senate candidate Rep. Mo Brooks (R-AL) has scored a fundraiser with former President Trump after his primary opponent, Katie Britt, fumbled a meeting at Mar-a-Lago, sources tell Breitbart News.

Trump's son, Donald Trump Jr., previously called her the Alabama Liz Cheney.?

Immediately following the meeting, Breitbart News confirmed that Trump vowed to host a fundraiser with Brooks to recertify his support for the staunch conservative.

Ted Cruz (R-TX), Rand Paul (R-KY), Americans for Legal Immigration (ALIPAC), and the National Association for Gun Rights, among others.
Britt's campaign spokesperson, Sean Ross, has since released a statement demanding Brooks drop out of the Senate race.
The meeting, leaked to Politico, noted that Britt met with Trump at Mar-a-Lago in Palm Beach, Florida, on Tuesday.
Britt is the former president and CEO of the U.S. Chamber of Commerce's Business Council of Alabama.
Alabama sources told Breitbart News that the meeting did not go well and left Trump unimpressed.
